title: Replace app logo with uploaded Indian Fitness logo

requirements.text: Add the uploaded new logo (use the transparent PNG upload) as a static asset under `frontend/public/assets/generated/` and standardize it to a square 512×512 PNG for consistent rendering.
acceptanceCriteria: A new 512×512 PNG logo file exists in `frontend/public/assets/generated/`.
The added logo has a transparent background (not a black/gray rectangle).
The logo renders crisp at small sizes (40–48px) without obvious cropping.

requirements.text: Update `frontend/src/config/branding.ts` to point `BRANDING.logo.path` to the new logo asset so the header and footer display the new logo everywhere the branding config is used.
acceptanceCriteria: `BRANDING.logo.path` is updated to the new asset path.
The header logo (in `frontend/src/components/layout/Header.tsx`) displays the new logo on desktop and mobile.
The footer logo (in `frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.tsx`) displays the new logo.

requirements.text: Update `frontend/index.html` favicon `<link rel='icon'>` to use the new logo asset so the browser tab icon matches the new logo.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/index.html` references the new logo asset for the favicon.
After reload, the browser tab/favicon shows the new logo (may require hard refresh depending on caching).

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only UI components).
Do not change Internet Identity/auth hooks in `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts` / `.tsx` or `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts` (immutable paths).
nonGoals: Changing the site color theme or typography.
Adding new logo placements beyond existing header/footer/favicon.

required: Square logo image based on the uploaded transparent PNG (logo-indian-fitness-unisex-gym.dim_512x512.png)

preferencesToAdd: Use English for any user-facing text.
